summary: This document outlines strategic goals for FBI Squad C-20 for fiscal year 2020, focusing on increasing undercover operations to recover victims and target hands-on offenders, supplementing manpower for the NYCEHTTF, and reducing workload for the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. It also provides an intelligence example from FY2019 involving the Saeed Norris child sex trafficking investigation.

persons.name: Saeed Malik Thomas Norris
persons.role: Subject of child sex trafficking investigation
persons.context: Arrested in FY2019 for conspiring to traffic juvenile victims for sex in Brooklyn; investigation was initiated based on an intelligence recommendation from a C-20 analyst.

events.title: Arrest of Saeed Malik Thomas Norris
events.description: Saeed Malik Thomas Norris was arrested for child sex trafficking based on an intelligence recommendation from a C-20 analyst, following interviews with juvenile victims from the Hard Knock investigation.

events.title: Strategic goals implementation for Squad C-20
events.description: Squad C-20 plans to increase undercover operations to recover victims in imminent danger and target hands-on offenders, supplement the NYCEHTTF with additional NYPD TFOs, and reduce workload for the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: Squad C-20's FY2020 goals include reducing the workload for case agents in the Jeffrey Epstein investigation through a surge in manpower.
An intelligence example from FY2019 highlights the arrest of Saeed Malik Thomas Norris for child sex trafficking, initiated based on an analyst's recommendation.
The document references ongoing investigations such as 'Hard Knock', 'Lamborghini Doors', and 'Dirt Bang Gang' that Squad C-20 will continue to pursue.
Emphasis is placed on targeting subjects engaged in sextortion, production of child pornography, and enticement of victims aged 12 and under.
The National Human Trafficking Resource Center provided a tip about a 15-year-old female abducted and commercially sex trafficked, which was forwarded to Squad C-20.
